sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' const Rating = ( {value, text, color} ) => { return (
= 1 ? 'fas fa-star' : value>=0.5 ? value= 'fas fa-star-alf-alt' : 'far fa-star'}> = 2 ? 'fas fa-star' : value>=1.5 ? value= 'fas fa-star-alf-alt' : 'far fa-star'}> = 3 ? 'fas fa-star' : value>=2.5 ? value= 'fas fa-star-alf-alt' : 'far fa-star'}> = 4 ? 'fas fa-star' : value>=3.5 ? value= 'fas fa-star-alf-alt' : 'far fa-star'}> = 5 ? 'fas fa-star' : value>=4.5 ? value= 'fas fa-star-alf-alt' : 'far fa-star'}> {text && text}
) } Rating.defaultProps = { color: '#f8e825' } Rating.propTypes = { value: PropTypes.number.isRequired, text: PropTypes.string.isRequired, color: PropTypes.number } export default Rating
